name: materialistically
content:
Add to word list

in a way that relates to money and possessions, especially the idea that these are the most important things in life: To the materialistically minded, such concepts are nonsense. I don't view life materialistically; I love what I do, and I consider it a privilege to do it.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is difficult for young people materialistically in a world where prices have gone up, and salaries have not increased.I think people need to have some idea of why we're here, rather than just succeeding materialistically.Materialistically, he has moved a long way from his working-class roots.
